item.title: Algebra Practice | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
This class is designed for students seeking reinforcement of classroom concepts through additional practice with grade-appropriate problems.
During a typical session, students will receive assistance with homework assignments and review concepts learned in school. As time allows, instructors will provide similar problems to further solidify understanding and boost confidence.
